CustomField.description: This field is automatically populated via trigger. It stores the LLC_BI__Current_Total_Lendable_Value__c value at the time the loan is booked. Total Lendable Value is the sum of all Collateral Mgmt records associated to the loan.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The sum of lendable value across all collateral attached to the loan. This field is populated by the system at the time the loan hits booked.
CustomField.label: Original Total Lendable Value
